original_text: The Egyptian soldiers followed after the Israelites to catch them. They went with all Pharaoh's horses, chariots and officers. The Egyptian army reached the place where the Israelites had put up their tents. That was beside the sea, near Pi-Hahiroth, across from Baal Zephon.
korean_text: 애굽 사람들과 바로의 말들, 병거들과 그 마병과 그 군대가 그들의 뒤를 따라 바알스본 맞은편 비하히롯 곁 해변 그들이 장막 친 데에 미치니라

sentences.original_text: The Egyptian soldiers followed after the Israelites
They went with all Pharaoh's horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바로의 모든 말과 함께 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: The Egyptian army reached the place
where the Israelites had put up their tents
